description: Feature : 1.Slide Design,Fridge Freezer Food Storage Shelf; 2.Also Can Be Used Under The Table To Hold Some Small Things. 3.One Small-Item Shelving Mounted On The Refrigerator Glass Partition . 4.This Storage Rack Is Ideal For Organizing Food,Drink,Fruit Etc. Which Is Very Suitable For Using Under The Table Or Refrigerator. 5.Lightweight And Durable Food Container,Folding Construction Design And It's Great To Be Put Into Refrigerator.
